job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - Supply Chain
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: A data engineering with knowledge of AWS, Automation using pyspark, and talend ETL is highlighted by the client to be ideal for this role. Other responsibilities include: Attend daily support meetings and manage support tickets Perform Incident/RITM review, perform basic RCA, and route tickets to Talend or Python/EMR developers Collaborate with developers to identify resolution approach and estimate efforts Provide inputs to scrum masters to create sprint and product backlog for production INCs/RITMs In future, more resources might be needed on the squad to manage incoming production INCs/RITMs  Bachelors Degree or Equivalent Experience  Minimum of 4 years of working experience as a Site Reliability Engineer Minimum of 2 years of working experience in the Products Industry $72,400 - $134,999
